title: Manage Expiring Inventory
description: A food wholesaler needs to manage inventory with expiration dates to ensure products are sold before they expire.

tasks.description: Run a report to identify all inventory that is approaching its expiration date.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gets a list of all products expiring in the next 30 days.

tasks.description: Notify the sales team to prioritize selling these items.
tasks.expected_outcome: The sales team is alerted to the expiring stock.

tasks.description: Offer a discount on the expiring items to encourage faster sales.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent applies a temporary discount to the products.
